video_description: The Eee Slate EP121 goes where you go, and handles all your work and play needs with intuitive input options such as a Bluetooth keyboard, capacitive touch screen or a Wacom® digitizer pen. Enjoy unbeatable performance in a tablet device with an Intel® Core™ i5 processor and Windows® 7 and stay productive or have a video call with family, no matter where you are. It's the perfect travel companion with uncompromised digital experience.
title: Eee Slate EP121- My powerful work and play companion

comments.text:
great commercial but i know a commercial which could have described the product better. 
you have andy samberg standing right there on a sofa,﻿ right? have him say:
When I got my new Eee Slate EP121 I JIZZED IN MY PANTS.
and thats it. I would buy it inmediately.
comments.author: HASHlRAMA

comments.text: full OS ftw.. nice one asus keep developing this product it is﻿ the only contender to ipad.. and tbh i prefer it as its a full computer :)
comments.author: shaolindreams

comments.text: indeed theres plenty of decent tablets out there.. im just thinking what will its main contender be. Though its good theres variation, people can﻿ choose which one suits their needs.
comments.author: shaolindreams

comments.text: True, but he still deserves about 25% of the profits for the redesign and not letting that guy get sacked and eventually killing﻿ his family  and committing suicide (he looked very emo).
comments.author: SambabaL

comments.text: I was so stoked when I seen this﻿ on engadget, finally someone is thinking of the illustrators and artists! Too bad I don't have a job or any money... such is the life of a poor illustrator.
comments.author: Joseph Lindsay
